name: gc_wsi_bgseg
title: Tissue-Background segmentation in histopathological whole-slide images

summary.description: This algorithm segments the background and tissue in histopathological whole-slide images.

outputs.label: WSI background and tissue segmentation mask
outputs.description: WSI background and tissue segmentation mask (MHA). The labels are: 0-background 1-tissue.

model.architecture: Fully convolutional network with 7 layers, ReLU activation functions in the first 6 convolutional layers and softmax in the last one. Max pooling was inserted after each of the first 3 convolutional layers.

details.name: Tissue-Background Segmentation in Histopathological Whole-Slide Images
details.cite: Bándi P, Balkenhol M, van Ginneken B, van der Laak J, Litjens G. 2019. Resolution-agnostic tissue segmentation in whole-slide histopathology images with convolutional neural networks. PeerJ 7:e8242

publications.title: Resolution-agnostic tissue segmentation in whole-slide histopathology images with convolutional neural networks

use.title: Intended use
use.text: This algorithm is a segmentation method of the background on whole-slide histopathology images. Ideally it uses a resolution of 2.0mm (TODO Should be verified!!!). The algorithm can also be found on Grand Challenge [1] (access upon request).

references.label: Algorithm on Grand Challenge (access upon request)

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.text: This algorithm was developed for research purposes only.
